title: Smart Route Optimization System Calculator
description:
Your team is building a route optimization system as part of a larger platform.

Design an algorithm that processes up to 43 elements optimally.

**Requirements:**
- Handle input sizes up to 43 elements
- Optimize for time complexity better than O(n²)
- Consider edge cases like empty inputs and boundary values
- Ensure the solution works within 1 second(s)

**Example Scenario:**
Input: Problem parameters and constraints
Output: Optimal solution

**Task:**
Implement a solution that meets all requirements and handles edge cases efficiently.
starter_code:
def solve(n):
    # TODO: Implement your solution here
    pass

if __name__ == '__main__':
    import sys
    n = int(sys.stdin.read().strip())
    result = solve(n)
    print(result)
hints: Break down the problem into smaller subproblems
Consider greedy vs dynamic programming approaches
